    # 4.2.1è·å–access_token

    access_tokenæ˜¯å…¬ä¼—å·çš„å…¨å±€å”¯ä¸€æ¥å£è°ƒç”¨å‡­æ®ï¼Œå…¬ä¼—å·è°ƒç”¨å„æ¥å£æ—¶éƒ½éœ€ä½¿ç”¨access_tokenã€‚å¼€å‘è€…éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œå¦¥å–„ä¿å­˜ã€‚access_tokençš„å­˜å‚¨è‡³å°‘è¦ä¿ç•™512ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ç©ºé—´ã€‚access_tokençš„æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸç›®å‰ä¸º2ä¸ªå°æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€å®šæ—¶åˆ·æ–°ï¼Œé‡å¤è·å–å°†å¯¼è‡´ä¸Šæ¬¡è·å–çš„access_tokenå¤±æ•ˆã€‚

    å…¬ä¼—å¹³å°çš„APIè°ƒç”¨æ‰€éœ€çš„access_tokençš„ä½¿ç”¨åŠç”Ÿæˆæ–¹å¼è¯´æ˜ï¼š

    1ã€å»ºè®®å…¬ä¼—å·å¼€å‘è€…ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­æ§æœåŠ¡å™¨ç»Ÿä¸€è·å–å’Œåˆ·æ–°access_tokenï¼Œå…¶ä»–ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘æœåŠ¡å™¨æ‰€ä½¿ç”¨çš„access_tokenå‡æ¥è‡ªäºè¯¥ä¸­æ§æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œä¸åº”è¯¥å„è‡ªå»åˆ·æ–°ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å®¹æ˜“é€ æˆå†²çªï¼Œå¯¼è‡´access_tokenè¦†ç›–è€Œå½±å“ä¸šåŠ¡ï¼›

    2ã€ç›®å‰access_tokençš„æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸé€šè¿‡è¿”å›çš„expire_inæ¥ä¼ è¾¾ï¼Œç›®å‰æ˜¯7200ç§’ä¹‹å†…çš„å€¼ã€‚ä¸­æ§æœåŠ¡å™¨éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®è¿™ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆæ—¶é—´æå‰å»åˆ·æ–°æ–°access_tokenã€‚åœ¨åˆ·æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œä¸­æ§æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯å¯¹å¤–ç»§ç»­è¾“å‡ºçš„è€access_tokenï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å…¬ä¼—å¹³å°åå°ä¼šä¿è¯åœ¨5åˆ†é’Ÿå†…ï¼Œæ–°è€access_tokenéƒ½å¯ç”¨ï¼Œè¿™ä¿è¯äº†ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ä¸šåŠ¡çš„å¹³æ»‘è¿‡æ¸¡ï¼›

    3ã€access_tokençš„æœ‰æ•ˆæ—¶é—´å¯èƒ½ä¼šåœ¨æœªæ¥æœ‰è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸­æ§æœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸ä»…éœ€è¦å†…éƒ¨å®šæ—¶ä¸»åŠ¨åˆ·æ–°ï¼Œè¿˜éœ€è¦æä¾›è¢«åŠ¨åˆ·æ–°access_tokençš„æ¥å£ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä¾¿äºä¸šåŠ¡æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ¨APIè°ƒç”¨è·çŸ¥access_tokenå·²è¶…æ—¶çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è§¦å‘access_tokençš„åˆ·æ–°æµç¨‹ã€‚

    å…¬ä¼—å·å’Œå°ç¨‹åºå‡å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨AppIDå’ŒAppSecretè°ƒç”¨æœ¬æ¥å£æ¥è·å–access_tokenã€‚AppIDå’ŒAppSecretå¯åœ¨â€œå¾®ä¿¡å…¬ä¼—å¹³å°-å¼€å‘-åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®â€é¡µä¸­è·å¾—ï¼ˆéœ€è¦å·²ç»æˆä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…ï¼Œä¸”å¸å·æ²¡æœ‰å¼‚å¸¸çŠ¶æ€ï¼‰ã€‚**è°ƒç”¨æ¥å£æ—¶ï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•â€œå¾®ä¿¡å…¬ä¼—å¹³å°-å¼€å‘-åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®â€æå‰å°†æœåŠ¡å™¨IPåœ°å€æ·»åŠ åˆ°IPç™½åå•ä¸­ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹è®¾ç½®æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å°†æ— æ³•è°ƒç”¨æˆåŠŸã€‚**å°ç¨‹åºæ— éœ€é…ç½®IPç™½åå•ã€‚

    æ¥å£è°ƒç”¨è¯·æ±‚è¯´æ˜

    httpsè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼: GEThttps://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=APPID&secret=APPSECRET
    1

    nodeJSè·å–access_tokenä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    //ä½¿ç”¨promiseå¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè¿”å›promiseå¯¹è±¡
//config.appID config.appSecret æµ‹è¯•å·çš„appIDå’Œappsecret
getaccessToken(){
const url = `https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=${config.appID}&secret=${config.appSecret}`
        //å‘é€è¯·æ±‚
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            rp({
                method: 'GET',
                url,
                json: "true"
            }).then(res => {
                console.log(res)
                /*æˆåŠŸè¿”å›å¦‚ä¸‹JSONï¼š
                { access_token:
                  '22_Z_qEv9jVwEpdMmXER8pRNFBDQbDgw1wvkE0nrAZaRbRHfnJ_qvIlS16vgMir8ozJG_3bogp7vWyJcrfbeu5knIMeTPEpxyKVYMp4BVebRPzBgnR3j3MuqCZFfyp6AmjQi7fHuebQ-zv2CGr1ONSjAHAAZE',
                   expires_in: 7200 }*/
                res.expires_in = Date.now() + (res.expires_in - 300) * 1000;
                resolve(res);
            }).catch(err => {
                reject("è·å–getAccessKotenå¤±è´¥" + err)
            })
        })
}

    # 4.1.2è·å–jsapi_ticket

    ç”¨4.2.1æ‹¿åˆ°çš„access_token é‡‡ç”¨http GETæ–¹å¼è¯·æ±‚è·å¾—jsapi_ticketï¼ˆæœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ7200ç§’ï¼Œå¼€å‘è€…å¿…é¡»åœ¨è‡ªå·±çš„æœåŠ¡å…¨å±€ç¼“å­˜jsapi_ticketï¼‰ï¼šhttps://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&type=jsapi

     getTicket() {
        ////ä½¿ç”¨promiseå¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè¿”å›promiseå¯¹è±¡
        return new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => {
            //å®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚åœ°å€
            //https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&type=jsapi
            const data = await this.getaccessToken();
            const url = `https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?access_token=${data.access_token}&type=jsapi`
            rp({
                method: 'GET',
                url: url,
                json: "true"
            }).then(res => {
                /*æˆåŠŸè¿”å›å¦‚ä¸‹JSONï¼š
                { access_token:
                    '22_Z_qEv9jVwEpdMmXER8pRNFBDQbDgw1wvkE0nrAZaRbRHfnJ_qvIlS16vgMir8ozJG_3bogp7vWyJcrfbeu5knIMeTPEpxyKVYMp4BVebRPzBgnR3j3MuqCZFfyp6AmjQi7fHuebQ-zv2CGr1ONSjAHAAZE',
                   expires_in: 7200 }*/
                // res.expires_in=Date.now()+(res.expires_in-300)*1000;
                resolve({
                    ticket: res.ticket,
                    expires_in: Date.now() + (res.expires_in - 300) * 1000
                });
            }).catch(err => {
                reject("è·å–getTicketå¤±è´¥" + err)
            })
        })

    }

    # 4.1.3ç”ŸæˆJS-SDKæƒé™éªŒè¯çš„ç­¾å

    ç­¾åç”Ÿæˆè§„åˆ™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼šå‚ä¸ç­¾åçš„å­—æ®µåŒ…æ‹¬noncestrï¼ˆéšæœºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼‰, æœ‰æ•ˆçš„jsapi_ticket, timestampï¼ˆæ—¶é—´æˆ³ï¼‰, urlï¼ˆå½“å‰ç½‘é¡µçš„URLï¼Œä¸åŒ…å«#åŠå…¶åé¢éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼‰ ã€‚å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰å¾…ç­¾åå‚æ•°æŒ‰ç…§å­—æ®µåçš„ASCII ç ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åºï¼ˆå­—å…¸åºï¼‰åï¼Œä½¿ç”¨URLé”®å€¼å¯¹çš„æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆå³key1=value1&key2=value2â€¦ï¼‰æ‹¼æ¥æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²string1ã€‚è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰å‚æ•°åå‡ä¸ºå°å†™å­—ç¬¦ã€‚å¯¹string1ä½œsha1åŠ å¯†ï¼Œå­—æ®µåå’Œå­—æ®µå€¼éƒ½é‡‡ç”¨åŸå§‹å€¼ï¼Œä¸è¿›è¡ŒURL è½¬ä¹‰ã€‚

    æ­¥éª¤1. å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰å¾…ç­¾åå‚æ•°æŒ‰ç…§å­—æ®µåçš„ASCII ç ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åºï¼ˆå­—å…¸åºï¼‰åï¼Œä½¿ç”¨URLé”®å€¼å¯¹çš„æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆå³key1=value1&key2=value2â€¦ï¼‰æ‹¼æ¥æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²string1ï¼š

    jsapi_ticket=sM4AOVdWfPE4DxkXGEs8VMCPGGVi4C3VM0P37wVUCFvkVAy_90u5h9nbSlYy3-Sl-HhTdfl2fzFy1AOcHKP7qg&noncestr=Wm3WZYTPz0wzccnW&timestamp=1414587457&url=http://mp.weixin.qq.com?params=value
    1

    æ­¥éª¤2. å¯¹string1è¿›è¡Œsha1ç­¾åï¼Œå¾—åˆ°signatureï¼š

    0f9de62fce790f9a083d5c99e95740ceb90c27ed
    1

    å…·ä½“ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    sign.js

    var createNonceStr = function () {
  return Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 15);
};

var createTimestamp = function () {
  return parseInt(new Date().getTime() / 1000) + '';
};

var raw = function (args) {
  var keys = Object.keys(args);
  keys = keys.sort()
  var newArgs = {};
  keys.forEach(function (key) {
    newArgs[key.toLowerCase()] = args[key];
  });

  var string = '';
  for (var k in newArgs) {
    string += '&' + k + '=' + newArgs[k];
  }
  string = string.substr(1);
  console.log(string)
  return string;
};

/**
* @synopsis ç­¾åç®—æ³• 
*
* @param jsapi_ticket ç”¨äºç­¾åçš„ jsapi_ticket
* @param url ç”¨äºç­¾åçš„ url ï¼Œæ³¨æ„å¿…é¡»åŠ¨æ€è·å–ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ hardcode
*
* @returns
*/
var sign = function (jsapi_ticket, url) {
  var ret = {
    jsapi_ticket: jsapi_ticket,
    nonceStr: createNonceStr(),
    timestamp: createTimestamp(),
    url: url
  };
  var string = raw(ret);
      jsSHA = require('jssha');
      shaObj = new jsSHA(string, 'TEXT');
  ret.signature = shaObj.getHash('SHA-1', 'HEX');

  return ret;
};

module.exports = sign;

    # 4.1.4æµ‹è¯•

    ä½¿ç”¨å¾®ä¿¡å¼€å‘å·¥å…·æµ‹è¯•ï¼ŒæˆåŠŸå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼š

    # 4.1.5ç¼“å­˜access_tokenå’Œjsapi_ticket

    ç”±äºaccess_tokenå’Œjsapi_tickeæœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ7200ç§’ï¼Œå¼€å‘è€…å¿…é¡»åœ¨è‡ªå·±çš„æœåŠ¡å…¨å±€ç¼“å­˜jsapi_ticketï¼Œæˆ‘ç¼“å­˜ä¸ºtxtæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå…·ä½“ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    wechat.js

    const config = require("./config.json")
const rp = require('request-promise-native');
const path=require('path');
const {
    writeFile,
    readFile
} = require("fs");
class Wechat {
    /**
     * è·å–access_token
     */
    getAccessToken() {
        //å®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚åœ°å€
        //https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=APPID&secret=APPSECRET
        const url = `https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=${config.appID}&secret=${config.appSecret}`
        //å‘é€è¯·æ±‚
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            rp({
                method: 'GET',
                url,
                json: "true"
            }).then(res => {
                console.log(res)
                /*è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœå¯¹è±¡
                { access_token:
                    '22_Z_qEv9jVwEpdMmXER8pRNFBDQbDgw1wvkE0nrAZaRbRHfnJ_qvIlS16vgMir8ozJG_3bogp7vWyJcrfbeu5knIMeTPEpxyKVYMp4BVebRPzBgnR3j3MuqCZFfyp6AmjQi7fHuebQ-zv2CGr1ONSjAHAAZE',
                   expires_in: 7200 }*/
                res.expires_in = Date.now() + (res.expires_in - 300) * 1000;
                resolve(res);
            }).catch(err => {
                reject("è·å–getAccessKotenå¤±è´¥" + err)
            })
        })

    }
    /**
     * è¯»å–access_token
     */
    readAccessToken() {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            readFile(path.resolve(__dirname,"accessToken.txt"), (err, data) => {
                if (!err) {
                    console.log("è¯»å–æˆåŠŸ");
                    data = JSON.parse(data)
                    resolve(data);
                } else {
                    reject("è¯»å–accessâ€”â€”tokenæŠ¥é”™" + err);
                }
            })
        })
    }
    /**
     * ç”¨æ¥æ£€æµ‹access_tokenæ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆ
     */
    isVaildAccessToken(data) {
        if (!data && !data.accessToken && !data.expires_in) {
            return false;
        }
        return data.expires_in > Date.now();
    }
    /*
     * ä¿å­˜access_token
     * */
    saveAccessToken(accessToken) {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            accessToken = JSON.stringify(accessToken)
            writeFile(path.resolve(__dirname,"accessToken.txt"), accessToken, err => {
                if (!err) {
                    console.log("ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ");
                    resolve();
                } else {
                    reject("ä¿å­˜accessâ€”â€”tokenæŠ¥é”™" + err);
                }
            })
        })
    }
    /**
     * ç”¨æ¥è·å–æ²¡æœ‰è¿‡æœŸçš„access_token
     */
    fetchAccessToken() {
        if (this.access_token && this.expires_in && this.isVaildAccessToken(this)) {
            //è¯´æ˜ä¹‹å‰ä¿å­˜è¿‡access_token,å¹¶ä¸”å®ƒæ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨
            return Promise.resolve({
                access_token: this.access_token,
                expires_in: this.expires_in
            })
        }
        return this.readAccessToken()
            .then(async res => {
                //æœ¬åœ°æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
                //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¿‡æœŸ
                if (this.isVaildAccessToken(res)) {
                    //æœ‰æ•ˆ
                    return Promise.resolve(res);
                } else {
                    //è¿‡æœŸäº†
                    //å‘é€è¯·æ±‚è·å–access_token
                    const res = await this.getAccessToken();
                    //ä¿å­˜ä¸ºæœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶
                    await this.saveAccessToken(res);
                    return Promise.resolve(res);
                }
            })
            .catch(async err => {
                //æ²¡æœ‰æœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶
                //å‘é€è¯·æ±‚è·å–access_token
                const res = await this.getAccessToken();
                //ä¿å­˜ä¸ºæœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶
                await this.saveAccessToken(res);
                return Promise.resolve(res);
            })
            .then(res => {
                this.access_token = res.access_token;
                this.expires_in = res.expires_in;
                return Promise.resolve(res)
            })
    }
    /**
     * @description: è·å–jsapi_ticket
     * @param {type}
     * @return:
     */
    getTicket() {
        //å‘é€è¯·æ±‚
        return new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => {
            //å®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚åœ°å€
            //https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&type=jsapi
            const data = await this.fetchAccessToken();
            const url = `https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?access_token=${data.access_token}&type=jsapi`
            rp({
                method: 'GET',
                url: url,
                json: "true"
            }).then(res => {
                /*{ access_token:
                    '22_Z_qEv9jVwEpdMmXER8pRNFBDQbDgw1wvkE0nrAZaRbRHfnJ_qvIlS16vgMir8ozJG_3bogp7vWyJcrfbeu5knIMeTPEpxyKVYMp4BVebRPzBgnR3j3MuqCZFfyp6AmjQi7fHuebQ-zv2CGr1ONSjAHAAZE',
                   expires_in: 7200 }*/
                // res.expires_in=Date.now()+(res.expires_in-300)*1000;
                resolve({
                    ticket: res.ticket,
                    expires_in: Date.now() + (res.expires_in - 300) * 1000
                });
            }).catch(err => {
                reject("è·å–getTicketå¤±è´¥" + err)
            })
        })

    }

    /**
     * è·å–ticket
     */
    saveTicket(Ticket) {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            Ticket = JSON.stringify(Ticket)
            writeFile(path.resolve(__dirname,"ticket.txt"), Ticket, err => {
                if (!err) {
                    console.log("ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ");
                    resolve();
                } else {
                    reject("ä¿å­˜ticketæŠ¥é”™" + err);
                }
            })
        })
    }
    /**
     * è¯»å–jsapi_ticket
     */
    readTicket() {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            readFile(path.resolve(__dirname,"ticket.txt"), (err, data) => {
                if (!err) {
                    console.log("è¯»å–æˆåŠŸ");
                    data = JSON.parse(data)
                    resolve(data);
                } else {
                    reject("è¯»å–ticketâ€”â€”tokenæŠ¥é”™" + err);
                }
            })
        })
    }

    /**
     * ç”¨æ¥æ£€æµ‹ticketæ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆ
     */
    isVaildTicket(data) {
        if (!data && !data.ticket && !data.expires_in) {
            return false;
        }
        return data.expires_in > Date.now();
    }
    /**
     * ç”¨æ¥è·å–æ²¡æœ‰è¿‡æœŸçš„ticket
     */
    fetchTicket() {
        if (this.ticket && this.ticket_expires_in && this.isVaildTicket(this)) {
            //è¯´æ˜ä¹‹å‰ä¿å­˜è¿‡access_token,å¹¶ä¸”å®ƒæ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨
            return Promise.resolve({
                ticket: this.ticket,
                ticket_expires_in: this.ticket_expires_in
            })
        }
        return this.readTicket()
            .then(async res => {
                //æœ¬åœ°æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
                //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¿‡æœŸ
                if (this.isVaildTicket(res)) {
                    //æœ‰æ•ˆ
                    return Promise.resolve(res);
                } else {
                    //è¿‡æœŸäº†
                    //å‘é€è¯·æ±‚è·å–access_token
                    const res = await this.getTicket();
                    //ä¿å­˜ä¸ºæœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶
                    await this.saveTicket(res);
                    return Promise.resolve(res);
                }
            })
            .catch(async err => {
                //æ²¡æœ‰æœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶
                //å‘é€è¯·æ±‚è·å–access_token
                const res = await this.getTicket();
                //ä¿å­˜ä¸ºæœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶
                await this.saveTicket(res);
                return Promise.resolve(res);
            })
            .then(res => {
                this.ticket = res.ticket;
                this.ticket_expires_in = res.expires_in;
                return Promise.resolve(res)
            })
    }
}
module.exports = Wechat;
